title: Mini-Ep 156: Light the Candle
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 156: Light the Candle
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discuss making holiday magic, fancy candles, and living in the moment. Plus Doree shares her challah recipe and listeners weigh in about ways to make a pandemic Thanksgiving special.Activity/Word of the Week: Reach out to someone in y...
description:
Kate and Doree discuss making holiday magic, fancy candles, and living in the moment. Plus Doree shares her challah recipe and listeners weigh in about ways to make a pandemic Thanksgiving special.


Activity/Word of the Week: Reach out to someone in your life, and let them know why they mean a lot to you. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
  • Visit Forever35podcast.com for links to everything mentioned on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.

HAWTHORNE - Find the perfect gift this holiday season by visiting Hawthorne.CO/GIFT! 

BRUUSH - Get an exclusive 25% off everything store-wide during the Pre-Black Friday sale today through November 22 when you use promo code FOREVER35-25 at bruush.com.

STITCH FIX - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 and you'll get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box. 

CONAIR - Try the Turbo Extreme Steam Handheld Steamer!To buy go to conair.com and search Turbo Extreme Steam.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
